configuration.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX pro: <http://purl.org/spar/pro/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX frbr: <http://purl.org/vocab/frbr/core#> PREFIX fabio: <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/> SELECT DISTINCT ?person (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?label; separator = " ; ") AS ?labelList) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?givenName; separator = " ; ") AS ?givenNameList)(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?familyName; separator = " ; ") AS ?familyNameList) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?coauthor; separator = " ; ") AS ?coauthorList) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?publicationYear; separator = " ; ") AS ?publicationYearList) WHERE{ ?person a foaf:Person ;OPTIONAL { ?person foaf:givenName ?givenName } .OPTIONAL {?person foaf:familyName ?familyName } .OPTIONAL {?person rdfs:label ?label } .OPTIONAL { ?person pro:holdsRoleInTime ?role }  .OPTIONAL { ?role pro:relatesToDocument ?relate } .OPTIONAL {?relate frbr:realization ?realization } .OPTIONAL {?coauthor pro:relatesToDocument ?relate } .OPTIONAL {?realization a fabio:JournalArticle } .OPTIONAL {?realization fabio:hasPublicationYear ?publicationYear } .}GROUP BY ?person
